memories.content: Waves 1-10 property/deal/document CRUD (2026-01-14). Market Data Pipeline: DB dashboard_market_data with 253K records (2026-02-05). ReportSettings + property transforms refactor + Zod validation (2026-02-07). Sales Analysis Dashboard: 10 endpoints, 6 visualizations, filter panel, 205 tests (2026-02-10). DealStage enum fix + deprecation cleanup (2026-02-10). Extraction Pipeline Review: 16 issues fixed (2026-02-11). Construction Pipeline COMPLETE: 5 DB tables, CoStar import, 6 API clients, scheduler, 15 endpoints, Leaflet map, 4 tabs (2026-02-11). UW Model Grouping Pipeline code COMPLETE: 6 new modules, 11 API endpoints, 137 tests (2026-02-11). Dashboard Multi-Page Fixes: Pipeline Map, delivery dates, interest rates live data, USA Market (2026-02-11). Real-Time Refresh + Scheduler Overhaul: force_refresh, InterestRateScheduler, FRED twice-daily (2026-02-12). UW Model Phase 3 Reference Mapping DATA COMPLETE: 30 groups validated, 2 with custom remaps (group_5: 11 fields, group_34: 13 fields), 28 use production reference, 179/180 canary hits (2026-02-12). Tests: 2042 total (1521 backend + 521 frontend), zero TS errors.

conda env: dashboard-backend. Backend port 8000, Frontend port 5173. Git: stash apply over pop, don't push unless asked. User prefers validation/testing before new features. No agent swarms for sequential dependent tasks. Be extremely clear about required user actions. User prefers directness over hedging. NO mock data, NO fake data, NO silent fallbacks — show errors instead. Commit strategy: split by logical area, push when asked. Obsidian vault: 'Programming Vault' at /mnt/c/Users/MattBorgeson/Documents/Programming Vault/Dashboard Interface. User demands thorough validation — test ALL files, not just samples. Don't overclaim confidence without evidence. User open to parallel agent teams for independent work streams.

pydantic-settings 2.x: CORS_ORIGINS must be JSON array. Single .env in project root, symlinked from backend/.env. Main DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data. VITE_API_URL: src/lib/config.ts appends /api/v1. DealStage enum: 6-stage. Alembic requires PYTHONPATH=. from backend dir. Zod 4.3.6: .transform() replaces manual transforms. SQLite in tests: no server_default, DateTime(timezone=True), datetime.now(UTC). StrEnum + SQLAlchemy: dealstage lowercase → values_callable. Lazy imports: patch at source module. ThreadPoolExecutor for CPU-bound Excel, sequential DB ops. React Compiler: no setState in useEffect, no ref.current in render. Alembic head: 6f4865487bb2 (widen fema_flood_zone). Prefer stdlib over third-party to avoid CI mypy stubs issues. Reference xlsx formula handling: use pandas read+write (not openpyxl copy+modify) to create formula-free reference files.

SHAREPOINT EXTRACTION: Production pipeline: FILE_PATTERN=.*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.*, CUTOFF_DATE=2024-07-15, excludes Speedboat/vOld. 28/28 files, 26 properties. Cell reference: Underwriting_Dashboard_Cell_References.xlsx (1,169 fields across 6 sheets). UW GROUPING PIPELINE: 30 active groups (244 files), 9 Proforma deferred, 2 Asset Mgmt excluded. UW files on native WSL2: /home/mattb/projects/dashboard_interface_project/backend/data/uw_model_files/. PHASE 3 REFERENCE MAPPING: 2 groups need custom references (group_5: 11 SALES_COMP_14_* fields +2 row offset, group_34: 13 5_BED_* fields +6 row offset). group_10 REVERTED to production (24/26 files use production layout). 28 groups use production reference directly. Canary: 30/30 groups pass, 179/180. Key insight: deep spot-check labels can show cross-contamination but data-level validation is needed to confirm whether group majority uses old or production layout.

1) UW Model Extraction Phase 4: Per-group extraction with dry-run, conflict check, savepoint/rollback, cross-group validation. Proforma groups deferred. 2) Docker Compose production config. 3) Production hosting — Oracle Cloud Free Tier or Hetzner CX22 with Tailscale. 4) Mobile-friendly iOS version (post-deployment). Domain context: Cabana on 99th + Tempe Metro = currently owned (Closed=owned, Realized=sold).
